metadata.description: SERIAL KILLERS MEET SERIAL KILLER... KILLERS! Cassie Hack vs. the Nailbiter! Vlad vs. the Lucha Eliminador! IT'S ON! Two brand spanking new tales of terror by the creative teams of both Image hits! TIM SEELEY returns to the character he created to give you a nasty blast from the past. If you've ever needed an excuse to read these two horrific comics, now is your chance!
metadata.name: Nailbiter / Hack/Slash
